amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for enforcement of any regulation prohibiting firearm possession that complies with State law on Corps projects and lands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 66 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement or enforce section 327.13(a) of title 36, Code of Federal Regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
